Dikabari Mantannya 'Meninggal,' Wanita Ini Malah Pergoki Mantan di Resto
02 Nov 2019, 12:00 by Andi Annisa Dwi Rahmawati - detikFood


Foto: iStock

Jakarta - Kisah kocak sekaligus mengerikan dialami wanita ini. Ia yang dikabari mantannya meninggal, malah bertemu sosok mantan tersebut di restoran.Dikutip dari Munchies Vice (31/10), semua kisah tersebut berawal dari kisah cinta Rassim Khelifa atau akrab disapa Alistair dengan wanita bernama Rachel. Keduanya bertemu di pub dimana Alistair menjadi chef dan Rachel merupakan pelayan.Perjalanan cinta keduanya berjalan mulus sampai suatu saat tangan Alistair patah karena berkelahi. Ia ingin meminjam uang hingga USD 1.000 dari Rachel untuk membiayai hidupnya selama tidak bekerja. Setelah diberi pinjaman besar, Alistair hanya mampu mengembalikan USD 300 hingga keduanya putus.


Foto: iStock

Ternyata Alistair tidak hanya meminjam uang ke Rachel. Ia juga meminjam uang dari teman-temannya dan mengantongi USD 2.200. Ia lalu menjalani rehab di Queensland. Singkat cerita, teman mereka memberi tahu Rachel kalau Alistair tewas.Ibunya bilang Alistair dibunuh karena mengambil uang dari geng biker. Rachel pun sempat merasa sedih dan berusaha mengubur semua kenangannya bersama Alistair hingga bisa melanjutkan hidup.Baca Juga: Putus Cinta, Wanita Ini Pilih Tutupi Foto Mantan Pakai Foto Steak! Dua tahun berlalu, Rachel dan temannya sedang santap di sebuah restoran di kota asalnya. Ia lalu sadar kalau saudara laki-laki Alistair juga bekerja di sana. Saat Rachel bilang pada pelayan kalau ia ingin berjumpa dengan kakak Alistair, pelayan itu bilang ia tidak di sana.


Foto: Istimewa

Yang ada adalah saudara laki-lakinya, Alistair. "Saya terkejut," kata Rachel mengetahui fakta itu. Ketika Rachel minta bertemu Alistair, ia didatangi manajer restoran yang memintanya pergi. Curiga dengan hal ini, Rachel berusaha menghubungi restoran via telepon dan bahkan polisi. Namun tak ada hasil.Beberapa menit kemudian, ibu Alistair mengiriminya SMS. Ia mengatakan hal yang dilakukan Rachel telah merugikan putranya.


Foto: Istimewa

Uniknya, beberapa tahun kemudian, Rachel berkunjung ke restoran lain dan melihat sosok Alistair lagi. "Kami melakukan kontak mata, dan Anda bisa melihat dia mengenali saya," katanya. "Saya seperti, 'Lama tidak bertemu!' Dan dia berkata, 'Oh yeah, sudah lama sekali,'" tutur Rachel.Namun percakapan itu terasa ganjil karena Alistair pura-pura tidak mengenal Rachel. Ia pun terlihat kikuk. Hingga kini Rachel tidak tahu pasti alasan Alistair niat memalsukan kematiannya sendiri. Padahal ia masih tinggal di kota yang sama sehingga kemungkinan bertemu dengan orang-orang sekitarnya masih sangat besar.Baca Juga: Pantun Makanan Kocak Curhatan Netizen Saat Ketemu MantanSimak Video "Pedas Menantang Nasi Bebek Khas Madura Pak Munawi"[Gambas:Video 20detik](adr/odi)

Reportedly His Former 'Died,' This Woman Is Even a Former Spouse in Resto
02 Nov 2019, 12:00 by Andi Annisa Dwi Rahmawati - detikFood


Photo: iStock

Jakarta - The funny and horrifying story experienced by this woman. He who was told by his ex died, instead met the figure of the ex in a restaurant. Quoted from Vice Munchies (31/10), all of these stories originated from the love story of Rassim Khelifa or familiarly called Alistair with a woman named Rachel. The two met at the pub where Alistair was a chef and Rachel was a waitress. The journey of love both went smoothly until one day Alistair's arm was broken from fighting. He wants to borrow up to USD 1,000 from Rachel to finance his life while not working. After being given a large loan, Alistair was only able to return USD 300 until both of them broke up.


Photo: iStock

It turned out that Alistair didn't just borrow money from Rachel. He also borrowed money from his friends and pocketed USD 2,200. He then underwent rehab in Queensland. Long story short, their friend told Rachel that Alistair was killed. His mother said Alistair was killed for taking money from a biker gang. Rachel also felt sad and tried to bury all of her memories with Alistair so that she could continue to live. Two years later, Rachel and her friend were eating at a restaurant in her hometown. He then realized that Alistair's brother also worked there. When Rachel told the waitress that she wanted to meet Alistair's sister, the waiter said he wasn't there.


Photo: Special

There was his brother, Alistair. "I was surprised," Rachel said knowing the fact. When Rachel asked to see Alistair, he was approached by the restaurant manager who asked him to leave. Suspicious of this, Rachel tried to contact the restaurant via telephone and even the police. But to no avail. A few minutes later, Alistair's mother texted him. He said what Rachel had done had harmed his son.


Photo: Special

Interestingly, a few years later, Rachel visited another restaurant and saw the figure of Alistair again. "We made eye contact, and you can see he recognizes me," he said. "I was like, 'Long time no see!' And he said, 'Oh yeah, it's been a long time,' "Rachel said. But the conversation seemed odd because Alistair pretended not to know Rachel. He also looks clumsy. Until now Rachel did not know the exact reason why Alistair intended to fake his own death. Even though he still lives in the same city, so the possibility of meeting with the people around him is still very large. / odi)
